description: The Manx government will look at a petition calling for a ban on the sale of fireworks to the public.
title: Tynwald to debate call for private fireworks ban
title_page: Tynwald to debate call for private fireworks ban - BBC News
maintext: Under current laws, those planning private displays must notify the Isle of Man Fire and Rescue Service of the location, date and time of the event, and advertise those details in a local newspaper at least ten days beforehand.
